Value.label: Set to Default
Value.Help: To configure the always awake mode.

Value.label: Feedback Time
Value.Help: To configure the time the beep is automatically turned off in seconds. 0x00: Disable, 0x01 - 0xFE: Value in seconds

Value.label: Feedback Timeout
Value.Help: To configure the timeout to wait for a WAKEUP_NO_MORE_INFORMATION before the error beep is automatically sound. The error beeps are fixed 8 beeps shortly after each other. 0x00: Disabled, 0x01 - 0xFF: Value in seconds

Value.label: Feedback beeps per second
Value.Help: To configure the number of beeps per second. Every beep is fixed about 10ms. 0x00 - 0xFF: Number of beeps per second

Value.label: Always awake mode
Value.Help: To configure the always awake mode.

Value.label: Operation mode
Value.Help: The mode that the Tag Reader 500 communicates with the associated gateway.

Value.label: Gateway confirmation
Value.Help: In gateway mode it is possible to let the gateway decide if the Tag Reader 500 can arm to home or away. If gateway indication is disabled the Tag Reader 500 automatically assumes that it can arm and will wait for a user input of RFID TAG or numeric code.
